description: This vibrant green butter bean mash is a tasty alternative to mashed potatoes.
name: Butter Bean, Parsley & Garlic Mash Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1.2 cup vegetable stock, hot, made with 1 stock cube

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 160°C/140°C fan-forced. Slice off the top of the garlic bulb, place in a sheet of tinfoil, drizzle with oil and wrap up. Roast for 30 minutes.
Heat the rest of the oil in a pan and cook the onion for 5 minutes. Add the chickpeas and stock and simmer for 10 minutes. Drain and reserve some of the stock.
Squeeze the roasted garlic into the pan and add the parsley. Blitz to a thick puree consistency with an immersion blender, adding more stock if necessary.
